sourcesContent:
// Import all the toolbar groups from ice-hockey.js
import {
  skating as running,
  skatingWithPuck as withBall,
  skatingBackwards as runningBackwards,
  passShot,
  lateralSkating as lateralMovement,
  pucks as balls,
  objects,
  nets,
  forward as offense,
  defense,
  people,
  positions,
  numbers
} from './ice-hockey.js';

let variants = [];

variants.push({
  name: "Full field",
  background: `
    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 800 500" fill="none">
      <rect width="800" height="500" fill="white"/>
      <line x1="37" y1="53" x2="762" y2="53" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="761" y1="54" x2="761" y2="447" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="762" y1="448" x2="37" y2="448" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="38" y1="447" x2="38" y2="54" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="37" y1="53" x2="762" y2="53" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="761" y1="54" x2="761" y2="447" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="762" y1="448" x2="37" y2="448" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="38" y1="447" x2="38" y2="54" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="237" y1="53" x2="237" y2="447" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="400" y1="54" x2="400" y2="447" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="564" y1="53" x2="564" y2="447" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="320" y1="134" x2="482" y2="134" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="320" y1="367" x2="482" y2="367" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="391.707" y1="241.293" x2="407.263" y2="256.849" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="407.263" y1="241.707" x2="391.707" y2="257.263" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="762" y1="136" x2="563" y2="136" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="6 6"/>
      <line x1="762" y1="369" x2="563" y2="369" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="6 6"/>
      <line x1="238" y1="136" x2="39" y2="136" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="6 6"/>
      <line x1="238" y1="369" x2="39" y2="369" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="6 6"/>
      <line x1="119.5" y1="244" x2="119.5" y2="257" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
      <circle cx="119.5" cy="250.5" r="20.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="679.5" y1="244" x2="679.5" y2="257" stroke="black" stroke-width="3"/>
      <circle cx="679.5" cy="250.5" r="20.5" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="37" y1="53" x2="762" y2="53" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="761" y1="54" x2="761" y2="447" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="762" y1="448" x2="37" y2="448" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="38" y1="447" x2="38" y2="54" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
      <line x1="391.707" y1="241.293" x2="407.263" y2="256.849" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    </svg>
  `,
  logo: {
    position: [0.5, 0.5],
    width: 0.1,
  },
});

export const mode = {
  id: "lacrosse",
  name: "Lacrosse",
  strokeWidth: 2,
  ratio: 0.625, // This is calculated from height/width (500/800)
  logo: `
    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100">
      <!-- Placeholder logo - you'll want to replace this with a lacrosse-specific logo -->
      <g fill="#253E56" fill-rule="nonzero">
        <path d="M50 0C22.4 0 0 22.4 0 50s22.4 50 50 50 50-22.4 50-50S77.6 0 50 0zm0 90C27.9 90 10 72.1 10 50S27.9 10 50 10s40 17.9 40 40-17.9 40-40 40z"/>
      </g>
    </svg>
  `,
  variants: variants,
  toolbars: [
    running,
    withBall,
    runningBackwards,
    passShot,
    lateralMovement,
    balls,
    objects,
    nets,
    offense,
    defense,
    people,
    positions,
    numbers,
  ],
  colors: [
    { name: "Black", color: "black" },
    { name: "Red", color: "#D00000" },
    { name: "Green", color: "#3F7D20" },
    { name: "Orange", color: "#FF5E24" },
    { name: "Blue", color: "#247BA0" },
    { name: "Grey", color: "#CFCFCF" },
    { name: "Yellow", color: "#F3DE1E" },
    { name: "Purple", color: "#840BE3" },
    { name: "Pink", color: "#FF00E5" },
  ],
  pdf: {
    logo: "", // We'll need to add a base64 encoded logo for PDF export
    footer: "Draw drills for FREE at LacrosseSystems.com", // Update this to your desired footer
  },
};
